name: Perfect World!
description:
Perfect World Level Up Games!
Before run the script, get the file installer in this page (web or torrent version): http://perfectworld.uol.com.br/download and then select when installer ask for him.
After installation finish, make sure that the checkbox "Launch game now" is unchecked, an only run the game when lutris scripts finish.
content:
files:
- pw_installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/Level Up/Perfect World/launcher/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: --mode unattended
    description: Running Perfect World Installer.
    executable: pw_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: ie8
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Internet Explorer 8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: tahoma
    arch: win32
    description: Installing tahoma font
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win32
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vb6run
    arch: win32
    description: Installing vb6run
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vcrun2005
    arch: win32
    description: Installing VCRUN2005
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    arch: win32
    description: Installing VCRUN2008
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dinput
    arch: win32
    description: Installing dinput
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun6
    arch: win32
    description: Installing vcrun6
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: OpenGL Renderer
    key: DirectDrawRenderer
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: opengl
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Adding DLL Overrides
    key: '*atl80'
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Adding DLL Overrides
    key: '*atl90'
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Adding DLL Overrides
    key: '*d3dx9_24'
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    value: native
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Adding DLL Overrides
    key: '*d3dx9_25'
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    value: native

    description: Adding DLL Overrides

    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    value: native
